results.name: Triangular matrix T, read by rows, that satisfies: SHIFT_LEFT(column 0 of T^((3*p-1)/3) = (3*p-1)*(column p of T), or [T^((3*p-1)/3)](m,0) = (3*p-1)*T(p+m,p) for all m>=1 and p>=0.
comment: Column 0 is A107716 (INVERTi of triple factorials). Column 1 is A107718 (twcie column 0 of T^(2/3), offset 1). The matrix logarithm divided by 3 yields the integer triangle A107724.
example: SHIFT_LEFT(column 0 of T^(p-1/3)) = (3*p-1)*(column p of T):
Matrix power (2/3), T^(2/3), is A107719 and begins:
compare column 0 of T^(2/3) to 2*(column 1 of T).
Matrix inverse cube-root T^(-1/3) is A107727 and begins:
compare column 0 of T^(-1/3) to column 0 of T.
Matrix inverse is A107726 and begins:
compare column 0 of T^(-1) to column 0 of T.
